changes.reasoning: Fix sticky headers appearing at wrong positions. The position calculations weren't accounting for marginTop on reasoning boxes (all except the first have marginTop: 1). Each subsequent reasoning block's header would stick further down than intended because the cumulative margin was missing from contentOffset.

Remove stale reasoningPaddingTop adjustment that caused headers to be cut off at the top and created gaps. The code was subtracting 1 from positions based on old paddingTop logic that no longer exists, causing misalignment between reasoning headers and file headers below them.
